name: Jerry's endless travels Escape (Remake) (Prototype)
description:
NOTE: This is just a prototype and final game could be different. Since there is a lot of things I wanted to change about this game I started to make a remake. The only things left from previous games: sprites for ship and treasures and some locations.
Differences:
- A lot longer map.
- Ships replaced by flying robots.
- Both treasures hidden more difficult to find.
- Small dungeon in the end.
- Much better intro music that in original game.
- Games starts at night.
- Other view for locations.
- Hidden mentions for 2 my other games.
- Second quest probably will be a giant alien castle.

You should find a treasure too, but the ending message is different.

Hope it was better than original.

Controls:

Q - Up A - down O -left P -right

2 or space - laser right

3 or b - laser left.
